scenes.title: Early Morning Alarm
scenes.description: Valentina's alarm sounds in the early morning darkness. She reaches from under her white sheets to silence her phone on the nightstand. The room is dark except for the phone's glow. An air conditioning unit hums softly.
scenes.character_state: sleepy, reaching for phone, early waking

generation_settings.model: Animagine XL 3.1 or equivalent anime SDXL model

notes.scene_selection_rationale: Selected 5 scenes per location covering key vocabulary and daily routines. Balanced morning (professional preparation) and evening (relaxation) scenes. Shows health-conscious lifestyle appropriate for a doctor character.
notes.vocabulary_focus: POC scenes cover approximately 55 vocabulary items across bedroom, bathroom, and kitchen locations. Focus on modern apartment living, professional preparation, healthy cooking, and self-care.
notes.character_consistency: All scenes should maintain Valentina's core appearance: long dark brown wavy hair, brown eyes, olive/tan skin, fit build. Hair in professional bun for work scenes, loose for home scenes. Professional attire for morning, casual for evening.
